Posts.Content: Hi, I am 33 years old my left armpit and breast are both swollen and very painful to touch, I'm sweating alot, my nipple itches. Does anyone know could cause this?
Posts.Title: Left armpit and breast swollen and painful

Posts.Content: Hi, Thank you for the responses. I went to dr. yesterday, did blood work and I have to have an ultrasound done on wednesday.
Posts.Title: Left armpit and breast swollen and painful
